name: OrgLimits

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Returns a list of OrgLimit instances.

methods.name: getMap
methods.description: Returns a map of all OrgLimit instances with the limit name as key.

description: Contains methods that provide a list or map of all OrgLimit instances for Salesforce your org, such as SOAP API requests, Bulk API requests, and Streaming API limits.
